Working draft for Packaging/TrainingSessions

Based on the success of the past MOTU Q&A sessions and UbuntuDeveloperWeek and UbuntuOpenWeek sessions, regularly scheduled Packaging Training sessions are being planned. These weekly one-hour sessions in <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.net-ubuntu-classroom | #ubuntu-classroom]]</nowiki> on Freenode will consist of short demonstrations and offer plenty of time to ask all kind of questions.

When possible multilingual developers will be availiable in `#ubuntu-classroom-chat-{de,es,fr,it,..}` who can answer questions for those newcomers that are not too familiar with the English language yet.

Want to get started with Ubuntu development and packaging? Come to the next session! Is there a specific topic you want to learn about? Leave a suggestion! Do you have packaging techniques you think other developers should know about? Schedule a session! 

We'd like to maintain a regular schedule and plan to have sessions always at these times:
* '''<DAY>, 1st week of the month,  6:00 UTC'''
* '''<DAY>, 2nd week of the month, 12:00 UTC'''
* '''<DAY>, 3rd week of the month, 18:00 UTC'''
* '''<DAY>, 4th week of the month,  0:00 UTC'''
